publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6917 Sandra White: Job Boost for Glasgow’s Financial Services—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by Barclays Bank to establish a global shared services hub in Glasgow’s financial district with the creation of an additional 600 jobs to complement its ongoing investment and wealth management divisions; supports the work of the Scottish Government in ensuring that Scotland continues to attract highly skilled jobs in what is seen as an increasingly competitive global market; understands that the terms of Regional Selective Assistance funding, which will support Barclays’ expansion plans, are conditional on Barclays meeting specific multi-year job creation targets, and believes that such conditions will lead to lasting benefits for Glasgow and Scotland’s financial services industry. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-6917 Job Boost for Glasgow’s Financial Services (lodged on 6 September 2010) Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-6917 Job Boost for Glasgow’s Financial Services (lodged on 6 September 2010) John Wilson*
S3M-6917 Job Boost for Glasgow’s Financial Services (lodged on 6 September 2010) Maureen Watt*
